cssmin.class.php
	cssmin
	v1.0
	MIT License
	cssmin reduces the size of stylesheet definitions by removing all unneeded whitespaces and comments.
	http://code.google.com/p/cssmin/

DiffMatchPatch/
	DiffMatchPatch
	v1.5
	LGPL
	Robust algorithms to perform the operations required for synchronizing plain text. 
	http://code.google.com/p/google-diff-match-patch/

HTMLPurifier/
	HTMLPurifier
	v4.0.0
	LGPL
	Standards-compliant HTML filter, filters out XSS.
	http://htmlpurifier.org/

JShrink.class.php
	JShrink
	0.2
	BSD License
	A Javascript Minifier written in PHP
	http://code.google.com/p/jshrink-/

PHPMarkdown/
	PHP Markdown Extra
	1.2.4
	3-Clause BSD
	Converts the plain text markup format "Markdown" to HTML for publishing on the web (with custom extensions)
	http://michelf.com/projects/php-markdown/

PHPSmartyPants/
	PHP SmartyPants Typographer
	1.0
	3-Clause BSD
	Translates plain ASCII punctuation characters into "smart" typographic punctuation HTML entities.
	http://michelf.com/projects/php-smartypants/

Twig/
	Twig
	v0.9.6
	3-Clause BSD
	Templating library
	http://www.twig-project.org/

Zend/
	Zend_Search_Lucene
	v1.10.8
	3-Clause BSD
	Full-text indexing library -- port of the Java library Apache Lucene
	http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.search.lucene.overview.html
